thread.title: Corcept Therapeutics to Announce and Full- Financial Results, Provide Corporate Update, Host Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Corcept Therapeutics to Announce and Full- Financial Results, Provide Corporate Update, Host Conference Call
text:
MENLO PARK, Calif., Corcept Therapeutics Incorporated (NASDAQ:CORT) today announced it will report its 2017 financial results and provide a corporate update on
February 22, 2018. The Company will also host a conference call that day at 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time (2:00 p.m. Pacific Time).
Conference Call Information
To participate, dial 1-800-289-0459 from the United States or 1-323-794-2558 internationally approximately 10 minutes before the start of the call. The passcode is 094798.
A replay will be available through March 8, 2018 at 1-888-203-1112 from the United States and 1-719-457-0820 internationally. The passcode will be 1581123.
About Corcept Therapeutics Incorporated
Corcept is a pharmaceutical company engaged in the discovery, development and commercialization of drugs that treat severe metabolic, oncologic and psychiatric disorders by modulating the effects of cortisol. Korlym is the company’s first FDA-approved medication. Corcept has a large portfolio of proprietary compounds that selectively modulate the effects of cortisol but not progesterone. Corcept owns extensive United States and foreign intellectual property covering the use of cortisol modulators in the treatment of a wide variety of serious disorders, including Cushing’s syndrome. It also holds composition of matter patents covering its selective cortisol modulators.
